metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

integration.name: AWS AMI
integration.description: The AWS AMI plugin searches for and returns an existing AMI, to be deployed as an EC2.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

activeRelease.readme:
The AWS AMI plugin searches for an returns an existing [AMI](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/AMIs.html),
to be deployed as an [EC2](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/concepts.html).

### Components

1. [Builder](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-ami/latest/components/builder/aws-ami-builder)

### Related Plugins

1. [AWS EC2](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-ec2)

components.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Search for and return an existing AMI.

### Interface

- Input: **component.Source**
- Output: **ami.Image**
components.name: AWS AMI Builder

variables.description:
DescribeImage specific filters to search with
the filters are always name => [value]
variables.type: map of string to list of string

variables.description: the name of the AMI to search for, supports wildcards
the set of AMI owners to restrict the search to
the AWS region to search in

component.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Search for and return an existing AMI.

### Interface

- Input: **component.Source**
- Output: **ami.Image**
component.name: AWS AMI Builder

variables.description:
DescribeImage specific filters to search with
the filters are always name => [value]
variables.type: map of string to list of string

variables.description: the name of the AMI to search for, supports wildcards
the set of AMI owners to restrict the search to
the AWS region to search in
